metadata.name: 3HM #1
metadata.description: Immerse yourself in the beauty of the Tang Dynasty pottery tradition with 3HM@DTXS, a limited edition collection of rare and exquisite Tri-Colored Glazed Horse NFTs. Each piece is a true masterpiece, showcasing unique combinations of background, pedestal, tail, skin, and armor. With only 888 NFTs available for purchase, owning a piece of history has never been more attainable. Join the NFT revolution and add 3HM@DTXS to your collection today.
